title: K-Lite Codec Pack 12.1.4 Update
description:
K-Lite Codec Pack 12.1.4 Update 

image

Size: 20 MB

Requires: Win All

image

New Features:

K-Lite Codec Pack is a collection of components needed for audio and video playback in DirectShow players such as Windows Media Player, Media Center, and Media Player Classic.Basic, Standard, Full, Mega as well as the latest update.

K-Lite Codec Pack is a collection of components needed for audio and video playback in DirectShow players such as Windows Media Player, Media Center, and Media Player Classic. This Codec Pack is designed as a user-friendly solution for playing all your movie files.

It contains everything you need to play all common audio and video file formats. It also provides additional functionality such a thumbnail generation in Explorer.

The pack has a very advanced installer which is highly flexible and has unique problem solving capabilities.


What's NEW:

Updated MPC-HC to version 1.7.10.207
Updated LAV Filters to version 0.68.1-0-g65b9a
Updated madVR to version 0.90.19
Updated MediaInfo to version 0.7.85
Updated x264VFW to r2694


image

* Open it (with winzip/winrar..)

* Just Run to use...

* Enjoy!
